body: #*Welcome to my homepage!* #**Zhi-Ling Liu** * Tel.: +86-10-62792491 * Email: lzl16@mails.tsinghua.edu.cn * Add.: Department of Automation, Tsinghua University, Beijing 100084, China ##Education * 2014 B.S. in Automation Engineering Tsinghua University, Beijing, China ##Work Experience * 2014.08-2016.08 Assistant Engineer, SAC, AVIC ##Research Interest * Event-based optimization * Performance evaluation and optimization for complex systems * Stochastic optimization ##Project Experience * Evacuation simulation case studies based on cloud computing, Graduate Design, Jan.2014-July.2014 ##Intern Experience * Institute of System Integration, Tsinghua University, Beijing China, July.2014 * Software Department, 614 Institute, AVIC, Aug.2014
